thread.title: 2016 Toyota Prius tech improves here, there, all over

title: 2016 Toyota Prius tech improves here, there, all over
text:
2016 Toyota Prius tech improves here, there, all over Oct 13, 2015 
Toyota Unveils Advanced Technologies in All-New Prius Prius to have highest fuel economy of any vehicle without a plug • 1.8-liter VVT-i engine achieves 40 percent thermal efficiency • Full hybrid system components have been made smaller and lighter, including the electric motor, transaxle, power control unit and hybrid battery • Newly developed lithium-ion or nickel-metal hydride … ( continue reading ) Energy Press Releases Get Breaking Energy Technology News by Email.
